keyPolicies.policyDescription: £10/hour minimum wage. Protect pensions with the triple lock.
Build a strong trading country. A Brexit that works for Britain: No 'Hard Brexit'.
Build more than a million new homes. This will include 500,000 council and housing association homes.
Stop the latest plans to destroy our NHS. Integrate social care and health care.
Invest with a new National Education Service. Fund it, not cut it, good comprehensive schools.

issues.brexitEurope: A Brexit that works for Britain: No 'Hard Brexit'.
issues.economy: An economy for all: £10/hour minimum wage. Protect pensions with the triple lock.
issues.education: Only Labour will fund education for all: Every school in our area is facing cuts with up to £225k cut from each primary and £0.6 million from each secondary. Labour will introduce a National Education Service and make sure big corporations pay to fund our children's future.
issues.health: Only Labour will save our NHS from attack: Our nation's most prized institution is being dismantled. The Royal Sussex is in 'special measures' and doctors' surgeries from Foxhill (Peacehaven) to Eaton Place (Kemptown) have closed. Enough is enough. Only Labour will save our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I was born in Brighton, live in Kemptown, had my first job in Peacehaven and currently I am a councillor here. I'm standing to fight for our area. For more homes, for our schools and hospitals, for a better Britain. For the many, not the few."

endorsements.endorsement: As a mother of two young children, I’m worried about school cuts and the lack of doctors’ places. I know only Lloyd will speak up for us in Peacehaven and the whole of Kemptown.

examples: Our nation's most prized institution is being dismantled.
The Royal Sussex is in 'special measures' and doctors' surgeries from Foxhill (Peacehaven) to Eaton Place (Kemptown) have closed.
Every school in our area is facing cuts with up to £225k cut from each primary and £0.6 million from each secondary.
Build more than a million new homes. This will include 500,000 council and housing association homes.
I hope that you agree Kemptown and Peacehaven deserves better.
We can build a better Britain where everyone has a home, all children go to a good school and our voice is represented in Parliament.
For the many, not the few.
Enough is enough. Only Labour will save our NHS.
I was born in Brighton, live in Kemptown, had my first job in Peacehaven and currently I am a councillor here.
I hope that you agree Kemptown and Peacehaven deserves better.
Our nation's most prized institution is being dismantled. The Royal Sussex is in 'special measures' and doctors' surgeries from Foxhill (Peacehaven) to Eaton Place (Kemptown) have closed.
Only Labour will fund education for all: Every school in our area is facing cuts with up to £225k cut from each primary and £0.6 million from each secondary.
An economy for all: £10/hour minimum wage. Protect pensions with the triple lock.
Build a strong trading country. A Brexit that works for Britain: No 'Hard Brexit'.

personalStories.story: As a mother of two young children, I’m worried about school cuts and the lack of doctors’ places. I know only Lloyd will speak up for us in Peacehaven and the whole of Kemptown.

examples: Louise Clarkson: As a mother of two young children, I’m worried about school cuts and the lack of doctors’ places. I know only Lloyd will speak up for us in Peacehaven and the whole of Kemptown.
It's clear that the Tories' economic model is broken and the prosperity enjoyed by the few is not shared by the many.
